UB_DESCRIPTION: Removes an applied "Background" from a card
NO_CHARACTER_FOUND: {{author}} The character on this card is no longer available on Sofi and cannot be interacted with
INVALID_CODE: {{author}} The card code you provided is either invalid or not in your collection
NO_GIF_CARD: {{author}} A `GIF` card cannot have its `Background` removed
NO_BACKGROUND: {{author}} That card has no `Background` applied to it
PROCESS_COST:
Removing the `Background` costs **1** `Wist` 
and will return the `Background` to your `Inventory`
NOT_ENOUGH_WIST: {{author}} You don't have enough `{{currency}}` to remove this `Background`
NO_OWNER: {{author}} The card is no longer in your collection
NO_BG_APPLIED: {{author}} That card has no `Background` applied to it
UNDO_BACKGROUND_SUCCESS: {{author}} The `Background` of your card was successfully removed and returned to your `Inventory`
